Header: No kings or royal families; a statement from Common Candidate Maithree.
Content: Common Candidate Maithreepala Sirisena said that another era of kings is not allowed in the country. He was speaking at a public rally held in Katana yesterday. Meanwhile UNP National leader Ranil Wickremesinghe said that an unexpected change is taking place in the country. He was addressing a special convention organized by the Jathika Sevaka Sangamaya today at the UNP headquarters Sirikotha.
